projects.name: LeetLab – Online DSA Practice Platform
highlights: Built a full-stack coding platform supporting real-time code execution, enhancing practice efficiency by 30%.
Implemented JWT-based authentication with role-based access control, reducing unauthorized access incidents by 40%.
Used React for frontend, Express.js for backend, and PostgreSQL for efficient database management and scalability.

projects.name: Book Store – A MERN Stack Real-Time E-Commerce App
highlights: Developed a full-featured e-commerce backend with secure JWT authentication and role-based access.
Implemented OTP login via Twilio, email notifications using Mailgen, and automated OTP cleanup with cron jobs.
Handled image uploads with Multer and Cloudinary for product management.
Integrated Razorpay payment gateway and real-time order tracking, increasing payment success rate by 20%.
